prompt:
Split and rephrase each complex sentence in the input into multiple if/then statements that convey a simple sentence syntax structure

An operator must obtain verifiable parental consent before any collection, use, or disclosure of personal information from children, including consent to any material change in the collection, use, or disclosure practices to which the parent has previously consented.

###
completion: If an operator collects personal information from children, then an operator must obtain verifiable parental consent. If an operator use personal information from children, then an operator must obtain verifiable parental consent.  If an operator disclose personal information from children, then an operator must obtain verifiable parental consent.  If a parent previously consents and an operator makes any material change to the collection practices, then operator must obtain verifiable parental consent. END

prompt:
Split and rephrase each complex sentence in the input into multiple if/then statements that convey a simple sentence syntax structure

An operator must give the parent the option to consent to the collection and use of the child's personal information without consenting to disclosure of his or her personal information to third parties.

###
completion: If an operator collects a child's personal information, then the operator must give the parent the option to consent to the collection and use of the child's personal information.  If the parent consents to the collection and use of the child's personal information, then they do not have to consent to disclosure of the child's personal information to third parties. END
